p: SARS: ( TITLE-ABS-KEY ( ( ( "Severe acute respiratory syndrome" OR "SARS") AND ( coronavirus*)) OR ( "SARS virus" OR "SARS disease" OR "Severe acute respiratory syndrome disease" OR "Severe acute respiratory syndrome virus" OR "SARS-Cov")) AND NOT TITLE-ABS-KEY ( ( "covid" OR "nCov" OR "Covid-19" OR "covid19" OR "SARS-Cov-2" OR "Severe acute respiratory syndrome-2" OR "MERS" OR "middle east respiratory syndrome"))) AND PUBYEAR > 2001.
